txt_en: Where you stumble and fall, there you will find gold.
txt_cn: 你在哪里跌倒，就会在哪里找到金子。
author: Joseph Campbell

txt_en: Soon is not as good as now.
author: Seth Godin

txt_en: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
txt_cn: 善良的心就如一口快乐的喷泉，让附近的一切都充满欢笑。
author: Washington Irving

txt_en: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
txt_cn: 自律是连接目标与成功的桥梁。
author: Jim Rohn

txt_en: Not being heard is no reason for silence.
txt_cn: 没有被听见不是沉默的理由。
author: Victor Hugo

txt_en: Winning isn't everything, but wanting it is.
txt_cn: 胜利并不能代表一切，而求胜心可以。
author: Arnold Palmer

txt_en: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
txt_cn: 我没有失败，我只是找到了10000种行不通的方法。
author: Thomas Edison

txt_en: Never look back unless you are planning to go that way.
txt_cn: 永远不要回头，除非你想走回头路。
author: Henry David Thoreau

txt_en: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
txt_cn: 在创造性表达和知识中唤醒快乐，是教师的最高艺术。
author: Albert Einstein
